amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to require the Comptroller General's Congressional Review Report to also be made available to the Congressional committees of jurisdiction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
